title: (x) Avant Garde look-a-like font ID - ITC Avant Garde Gothic with alternates {Seb}
content:
Dear all type addicts,

I just moved recently and all my type swatch books are in some box and I can't locate it...most probably underneath a huge stack of heavy boxes.

I remember this as Avant Garde but the M and V looks different.  
Can someone kindly let me know, I need to use it today.

Thanks!

Calvin

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100329014103im_/http:/typophile.com/files/nice_5364.png)
author: aa101

comments.content: That IS Avant Garde with some of the alternate characters.

OK cool, that's what I thought.  
Thank you Seb!
Read about [ITC Avant Garde Gothic Alternates & Ligatures](http://web.archive.org/web/20100329014103/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontlist/genres/itc_avant_garde_gothic_alternate/) at FontShop.com.
